subject: Handicapped
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The Court of Arbitration for Sport ruled that Oscar Pistorius, a 21-year-old double-amputee sprinter, was eligible to compete in the Olympics.
snippet: The Court of Arbitration for Sport ruled that Oscar Pistorius, a 21-year-old double-amputee sprinter, was eligible to compete in the Olympics.
